  1. # 2 "asmcomp/s390x/reload.ml"
  2. (**************************************************************************)

  6. (*             Xavier Leroy, projet Cristal, INRIA Rocquencourt           *)
  7. (*                                                                        *)
  8. (*   Copyright 1996 Institut National de Recherche en Informatique et     *)

  15. (**************************************************************************)

  17. (* Reloading for the Z Processor *)

  19. open Arch
  20. open Mach

  22. class reload = object (self)

  24. inherit Reloadgen.reload_generic as super

  26. (* For 2-address instructions, reloading must make sure that the
  27.    temporary result register is the same as the appropriate
  28.    argument register. *)

  30. method! reload_operation op arg res =
  31.   match op with
  32.   (* Two-address binary operations: arg.(0) and res.(0) must be the same *)
  33.   | Iintop(Iadd|Isub|Imul|Iand|Ior|Ixor)  | Iaddf|Isubf|Imulf|Idivf ->
  34. ‌      let res = self#makereg res.(0) in
  35.       ([|res; self#makereg arg.(1)|], [|res|])
  36.   (* Three-address ternary operations: arg.(2) and res.(0) must be the same *)
  37.   | Ispecific(Imultaddf|Imultsubf) ->
  38. ‌      let res = self#makereg res.(0) in
  39.       ([|self#makereg arg.(0); self#makereg arg.(1); res|], [|res|])
  40.   (* One-address unary operations: arg.(0) and res.(0) must be the same *)
  41.   |  Iintop_imm((Imul|Iand|Ior|Ixor), _) ->
  42. ‌      let res = self#makereg res.(0) in
  43.       ([|res|], [|res|])
  44.   (* Other instructions are regular *)
  45.   | _ ->
  46.       super#reload_operation op arg res

  48. end

  50. ‌let fundecl f num_stack_slots =
  51.   (new reload)#fundecl f num_stack_slots
